task.title: Preparing to Start the Engine
task.shortdesc: Verify the necessary safety and operational steps before attempting to start the engine.

prereq.p: Ensure you are familiar with the vehicle's controls and are seated in the driver's position.

step.cmd: Pull the hand lever, located on the floor to the left of the driver, all the way back
step.stepxmp: This action holds the in neutral and engages the hub brake to prevent vehicle movement.

substep.cmd: Insert the switch key into the switch on the coil box
Throw the switch lever as far to the left as possible, to the "" position
substep.stepxmp: This connects the magneto to the engine, which is necessary for starting.

result.p: The vehicle is now prepared for engine startup, with the clutch in neutral and the electrical system connected.
